desc: This course considers masterworks of Russian and Soviet cinema from the Bolshevik revolution to the present. Students examine significant Russian contributions to world cinema. Readings and topics include basic cinema analysis, Russian cinema criticism, and Russian film theory. Offered in alternate years. Counts toward film studies concentration.
name: Intro Russian Film-Tr

revisions.desc: This course considers masterworks of Russian and Soviet cinema from the Bolshevik revolution to the present. Students examine significant Russian contributions to world cinema. Readings and topics include basic cinema analysis, Russian cinema criticism, and Russian film theory. No prerequisites. Offered in alternate years. Counts toward film studies concentration.

title: Introduction to Russian and Soviet Film
